movie.title: Easter Bunny Adventure
movie.description_intro: The Easter Bunny looking for the best Easter Egg, on his way to find it, he runs into friends and they tell him different fables.
movie.description_full: The Easter Bunny looking for the best Easter Egg, on his way to find it, he runs into friends and they tell him different fables.

movies.title: The Haunted World of El Superbeasto
movies.title_english: The Haunted World of El Superbeasto
movies.title_long: The Haunted World of El Superbeasto (2009)
movies.summary: The story follows the adventures of El Superbeasto, a washed-up Mexican luchador, and his sultry sidekick and sister Suzi-X as they confront an evil villain by the name of Dr. Satan. The adventure, set in the mythic world of Monsterland, also has a character named Murray the robot.
movies.description_full: The story follows the adventures of El Superbeasto, a washed-up Mexican luchador, and his sultry sidekick and sister Suzi-X as they confront an evil villain by the name of Dr. Satan. The adventure, set in the mythic world of Monsterland, also has a character named Murray the robot.

movies.title: To the Forest of Firefly Lights
movies.title_english: To the Forest of Firefly Lights
movies.title_long: To the Forest of Firefly Lights (2011)
movies.summary: Hotaru is rescued by a spirit when she gets lost in a forest as a child. The two become friends, despite the spirit revealing that he will disappear if he is ever touched by a human.
movies.description_full: Hotaru is rescued by a spirit when she gets lost in a forest as a child. The two become friends, despite the spirit revealing that he will disappear if he is ever touched by a human.
movies.synopsis: Hotaru is rescued by a spirit when she gets lost in a forest as a child. The two become friends, despite the spirit revealing that he will disappear if he is ever touched by a human.

movies.title: Sheep and Wolves: Pig Deal
movies.summary: The united town of sheep and wolves lives a peaceful and quiet life until two unexpected guests turn up - a polar fox and a tiny ewe. No one ever expected them to bring a deadly danger, which can be overcome only if they work together. Only teamwork can solve big problems and deal with serious challenges - as there is strength in unity.

movies.title: Tokyo Godfathers
movies.summary: Christmas in Tokyo, Japan. Three homeless friends: a young girl, a transvestite, and a middle-aged bum. While foraging through some trash, they find an abandoned newborn. Hana, the transvestite with delusions of being a mother, convinces the others to keep it overnight. The next day, using a key found with the baby, they start tracking down the parents, with many adventures along the way.
